markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Burr Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1044)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 181 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Wooden Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This well-crafted [wooden shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2) (Hardness 5, HP 30, BT 15) is covered in numerous seed pods with long spurs. You can Strike with these burrs as though they were _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shield spikes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=42)_.

<document level="2" id="action-834" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Burr Shield
